about_the_game:
Season 2: White Dawn is included in the Year 1 Pass.

Take science to new snowy heights!

Science is advancing everyday, and researchers are going to the most remote places. Conquer the uncharted, snowy peaks of the Carpathian Mountains and help scientists to conduct their research for only the most experienced explorers can tame the dangerousness of the mountains. Dive into dark caverns to pursue major discoveries.

Season 2: White Dawn includes :

• A new map in the Carpathian Mountains. Explore snow-covered cols and valleys in the middle of ruthless nature.
• A huge underground map. Use all your skills to progress safely.
• Two new six-wheeled vehicles: the Decin S-3T, a robust truck that can overcome any obstacle, and the Traun BR-0D, an off-road master that will be of great use in these uneven terrains.
• The legendary Mercedes Unimog 2450: this iconic vehicle is built for various missions across rugged terrain. With outstanding ground clearance and adaptability, it’s an essential companion for any expedition.
• Two new specialists: a hydrologist who can plumb the depth of snow, and a logistician who improves the ground drones use.
